participant_1.name: Lena
participant_1.personality: Introverted and creative, Lena often finds solace in her online world, where she expresses herself through vibrant hair colors and immersive gaming experiences.
participant_1.background: my dream in life is to work from home. i went to school to be a veterinarian but hated it. i dye my hair every three months. i've an internet addiction and spend a lot of time playing roleplaying games. i faint at the sight of blood.

participant_2.name: Sarah
participant_2.personality: Curious and thoughtful, Sarah enjoys exploring new ideas through literature and film, cherishing the knowledge she gains and sharing it with those around her.
participant_2.background: i read a book every week. my favorite kind of movie is a documentary. i started a new job as a pa three months ago. i'm pregnant with my first child. i live with my husband in pennsylvania.
